dcterms:description: Sheikh M.A.A. Albani Zaria teaches how Muslims run government, politically, socially and morally according to Islamic religious leadership with reasoning with regard to Islamic scholars and tells the difference between polity and democracy in Islam.

Sheikh M.A.A. Albani Zaria ya karantar da mu yadda musulunchi ya karantar da yadda ake gudanar da tsarin mulki, da shugabanchi da siyasa a musulumchi, da kuma bayani akan bambanchin dake tsakanin siyasa da demokuradiyya bisa hujjoji daga littafan malamai yayin gabatar da laccar mai lacca demokuaradiyya.

littattafan manyan malamai.

as a result of lacking good advice, guidance, and counseling for the professional Islamic scholars, with the reference
from Muslim scholars.

Subject/Focus
Dalilin wannan lecca shine don tunawa da ranar
demokuradiyyah a Nigeria cikarta shekara 10 kuma
matsayin muna makiyanta saboda sharrinta da manifofinta.
The purpose of this lecture is to commemorate the 10th
anniversary of democracy in Nigeria and the fact that we
are enemies of it because of its evil and policies.

– 37:30

Bayani akan ka’idoji guda shida (6) wanda zasu zama
kariya ga mai mulki wajen mulki ba da abinda Allah ya
saukar ba.
1. Dole ne bin dokar da Allah ya saukar akan kowane
musulmi aya ta 49 Suratul Ma’ida
2. Wajibci da yin hukunci da abin da Allah ya hukunta aya
ta 65 Suratul Nisa.
3. Azaba ga duk wanda bai yi hukunci da abinda Allah ya
saukar ba aya ta 44, 45,47 na Suratul Ma’ida.
4. Tsoratarwa da kwaba akan wanda bai aiwatar da
hukunci da aya ta 63 na Suratul Noor.
5. Hukunci Allah shi yafi na kowa kyau da komai kyan
nawani, aya ta 50 na Suratul Ma’ida.
6. Haka muka yi maka Ni’ima da shiryarwa aya ta 52 na
Suratul Shura.
Explaination of 6 guidaince rules of the leader governing
through democracy or any other system.
1. Every Muslim must obey the rule of Allah verse 49,
Sura Al-Ma'idah.

SUBJECT/FOCUS
Bayani akan matsalar haila ga mata. Wannan shi ne jini daya fita
daga farjin mace a kowane wata.
Explain about problem of female menstruation period.
Menstruation period is blood spread from a female every month.
Malamai sun banbanta wajen cewa wane lokacine mace zata fara
wannan haila wasu sun ce daga shekara 9 zuwa 52, wasu sunce
daga shekara 11 zuwa 52.
Wasu malaman kuma sunce balagar mace ko namiji tana da alaka
da wajen da mutum yake ko da zama ko kuma yanayin halittarsa.
Sahihiyar Magana ita ce duk mace da ta kai shekara 9 zuwa
shekara 75 idan ta ga jinni daga farjin yana fita kuma tana lafiya
to wannan sai a bashi hukuncin jinni haila bisa dogaro da ijma’in
malamai.

an infidel if a Muslim is also competing.

dcterms:description: Sheikh M.A.A. Albani warned politicians and the rich to stop taking everything into their homes.
Sheikh M.A.A. Albani ya yi gargadi da janhankali ga yan siyasa da mai kudi kan su daina kai masa komai gidansa don baya bukata amma shi yana da shi.
dcterms:rights: In Copyright - Rights-Holder(s) Unlocatable or Unidentifiable
bibo:content:
00:01 – 17:20
Bayani akan abin da yake damunsa ga ‘yan siyasa game da abubuwan nan da suke kai a matsayin kyauta ko cin hanci.
Ni dan kasuwa ne bana neman komai ga wani dan siyasa, don ni dan kasuwa ne.
Mu ‘yan salafiyya bamu son komai agurin ku, sai dai muna son ku yi wa jama’a aikin da suke so.
A yanzu, ni dai ba zaka ba ni wani abu dan ka burge ni ba da sunan kyauta kamar mota, gida ko aure.

The Islamic scholar advises politicians and rich people to stop sending food and other goods to his house as gifts. Alabani says he is a businessman, not a bagger, because that is not charity but bribery, so he doesn't need anything as a gift from anyone, especially politicians.

dcterms:title: ACEEMUB, IBOURAIMA Idrissa meilleur récitateur du coran pour représenter l'ACEEMUB au Togo
dcterms:description:
Le Bureau Exécutif National de l'ACEEMUB a effectué dans la matinée de ce jour, Jeudi 16 Mai 2019, une compétition du Coran pour la s Mai élection du meilleur recitateur du Coran qui va représenter les élèves et étudiants musulmans du Bénin au concours national de récitation du saint Coran au Togo-CNRSC- organisé par l'AEEMT.
Cinq localités en competition (Djougou, Tanguieta, Abomey Calavi, Cotonou Est et Cotonou Ouest) : une seule est retenue gagnante, il s'agit de Cotonou Ouest avec son candidat IBOURAIMA Idrissa, Microbiologiste en formation.
C'est lui qui représentera désormais le Bénin au Togo pour le CNRSC.
Qu'Allah vous récompense !!!
